xwikidoc.author: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: HTML5 Presentation Application
xwikidoc.content:
This application allows you to create HTML5 presentations by transforming a wiki page into a presentation.
It works by following some simple rules and then by applying a special skin to the presentation page.
To learn how to use it you can: * [[Read the documentation>>http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Presentation+Application]] * Check out this [[Example Presentation about XWiki>>Presentation.XWikiPresentation]]
